channel.title: About the Low Fire Glazes category
channel.description: Low-fire glazes are typically under cone 4. They include a broad range of different types of glazes, including raku and majolica.

item.title: About the Low Fire Glazes category
item.dc:creator: ceramicswiki
item.description:
Low-fire glazes are typically under cone 4. They include a broad range of different types of glazes, including raku and majolica.
